config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration _journalAgeThreshold is used in the code to set the age threshold for the journal. It is passed as a parameter to the PersistentJournal constructor along with other parameters.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _journalAgeThreshold configuration depends on the usage of the journal. It is triggered whenever a new journal is created or accessed.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _journalAgeThreshold configuration option on the system is that it determines how long entries are kept in the journal before they are considered old and potentially removed. This can affect the size of the journal and the performance of the system.
